Title: Inside Man
Produced by:
Danny A. Abeckaser 
 Kyle Stefanski 
 Gustavo Nascimento 
 Jon Brewer
Starring:
Emile Hirsch 
 Jake Cannavale 
 Lucy Hale 
 Ashley Greene 
 Danny A. Abeckaser 
 Vincent Laresca 
 Kyle Stefanski 
 James Russo 
 Robert Davi
Cast: Danny A. Abeckaser as Roy DeMeo
Bo Dietl as Captain Rick Callan
Production: In March 2022, it was announced that Emile Hirsch, Lucy Hale, Ashley Greene and Greg Finley would star in the film.
Principal photography began in March 2022 in Los Angeles and New York.
Release: In February 2023, Vertical Entertainment purchased the North American rights to the film, then titled The Gemini Lounge, after the name of a bar in Brooklyn, which was frequented by the mob.
The film was released in theaters and on demand on August 11, 2023.
